item.title: 微策略公司购买 46 亿美元比特币的最大一笔交易
item.description: 微策略公司以约 46 亿美元的价格购买了约 51,780 枚比特币，这是这家加密对冲基金代理公司自四年多前开始收购数字资产以来的最大一笔交易。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. bought about 51,780 Bitcoin for around $4.6 billion, the largest purchase by the crypto hedge-fund proxy since it began acquiring the digital-asset more than four years ago.】

item.title: 欧盟向卢旺达额外拨款 2,000 万欧元，用于在莫桑比克打击恐怖主义
item.description: 欧洲理事会同意向卢旺达国防军额外提供 2000 万欧元，以支持其在莫桑比克的部署，卢旺达国防军正在那里帮助打击伊斯兰国支持的叛乱活动。【原文：The European Council agreed to provide the Rwanda Defence Force with an additional €20 million to support its deployment in Mozambique, where it’s helping to fight an Islamic State-backed insurgency.】

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱对特朗普和自己的成就感到眩晕
item.description: 前天晚上，在马阿拉歌（Mar-a-Lago）举行的一个黑色礼服晚会上，阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）无法控制自己。这次聚会是为了庆祝唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当选，没有人能够超越米莱伊。他转圈、旋转、摇摆、兄弟相拥，闪烁着竖起的大拇指— 有时是一个，有时是两个，以示强调— 并在摄像机的闪光灯下露出最灿烂的笑容。【原文：At a black-tie gala at Mar-a-Lago the other night, Argentine President Javier Milei couldn’t contain himself. The gathering had been arranged to celebrate the election of his guy Donald Trump, and no one was going to outdo Milei. He whirled, pivoted, swayed, bro-hugged, flashed the thumbs-up sign — sometimes one, sometimes, for emphasis, two — and beamed the broadest of smiles as the cameras flashed.】

item.title: 核聚变领导者希望将老旧煤电厂改造成突破性核电站
item.description:
联邦聚变公司（Commonwealth Fusion）在寻求生产清洁电力的道路上跨过了一道关键的门槛。它正在将关闭的化石燃料发电厂作为发电的首选地点。【原文：

Commonwealth Fusion has crossed a key threshold on its quest to generate clean power. It's eyeing shuttered fossil-fuel plants as prime sites to do so.

】

item.title: 芬兰称为数据中心提供服务的德国海底链路被切断
item.description: 连接芬兰和德国的海底数据电缆周一断线，当局报告称连接已被切断。【原文：An undersea data cable connecting Finland and Germany fell offline on Monday, with authorities reporting the link was cut.】

item.title: 印度财政部长称银行利率应更实惠
item.description: 印度财政部长呼吁降低借贷成本，并淡化经济增长面临的任何风险。【原文：India’s finance minister called for lower borrowing costs and downplayed any risks to economic growth.】

item.title: 希腊银行痛苦转型后寻求海外交易
item.description: 希腊最大贷款机构的高层管理人员表示，在经历了多年痛苦的重组之后，希腊银行已准备好在海外花钱进行交易。【原文：Greek banks are ready to spend money on deals abroad after emerging from years of painful restructuring, said the the top executives of the nation’s largest lenders.】

item.title: 据说小米投资了顺丰控股的香港股票出售活动
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，小米公司旗下的一家公司是中国快递企业顺丰控股有限公司（SF Holding Co.【原文：A Xiaomi Corp. unit is among cornerstone investors in Chinese courier SF Holding Co.’s Hong Kong listing, people familiar with the matter said, showing appetite for one of the biggest share sales in the city this year.】

item.title: 液化天然气可替代俄罗斯管道天然气，但成本高昂
item.description:
中欧国家被提醒从莫斯科转移物资的成本有多高。【原文：

Central European countries have been served a reminder of how expensive it is to ditch supplies from Moscow.

】

item.title: Anima 股东称 Banco BPM 出价未反映价值
item.description: Banco BPM SpA 以 16 亿欧元的全现金收购 Anima Holding SpA 的报价并没有充分估价这家意大利资产管理公司的潜力。【原文：Banco BPM SpA’s €1.6 billion all-cash offer to take over Anima Holding SpA doesn’t adequately price the potential of the Italian asset manager, according to one of its top shareholders.】

item.title: 诺和诺德在中国推出韦格威，价格远低于美国
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）将在中国推出其最畅销的肥胖症药物韦格韦，价格仅为美国的一小部分，这是为其大片专营权打开一个快速增长的巨大市场的关键一步。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S is launching its top-selling Wegovy obesity drug in China at a fraction of the US price, a key step in unlocking a big, fast-growing market for its blockbuster franchise.】

item.title: 穆迪因政治风险将孟加拉国评级进一步降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周一下调了孟加拉国的主权评级，理由是这个南亚国家的政治风险加剧，增长前景黯淡。【原文：Moody’s Ratings downgraded Bangladesh’s sovereign rating on Monday, citing heightened political risks and lower growth prospects for the South Asian nation.】

item.title: 经济学家努力为特朗普新时代建模
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，我和卡蒂娅-德米特里耶娃（Katia Dmitrieva）将探讨特朗普在大选中获胜如何让世界经济预测者的日子变得艰难。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today, Katia Dmitrieva and I look at how Trump’s election victory is making life tough for the world’s economic forecasters. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 巴西分析师上调 2025 年利率和通胀预测
item.description: 在央行行长警告货币紧缩周期将延长之后，巴西分析师上调了对明年年底基准利率和通货膨胀率的预期。【原文：Brazil analysts raised their estimates for the benchmark interest rate and inflation at the end of next year after central bankers warned of a prolonged monetary tightening cycle.】

item.title: CVS 在激进派压力下任命 Glenview 的 Robbins 进入董事会
item.description: CVS Health Corp. 任命 Glenview Capital Management 创始人 Larry Robbins 为董事会成员，这是与激进公司达成协议的一部分。【原文：CVS Health Corp. named Glenview Capital Management founder Larry Robbins to its board as part of an agreement with the activist firm that’s been pressuring the company for change.】

item.title: 人工智能聊天机器人 "女友 "唤起人们的阴暗面
item.description: 个性驱动的聊天机器人帮助人们减少孤独感，但它也有阴暗的一面。但首先...【原文：Personality driven chatbots to help people feel less lonely have a dark side. But first...】

item.title: 捷克央行行长警告全球通胀将大幅波动
item.description: 捷克央行行长阿莱士-米歇尔（Ales Michl）表示，全球各经济体的消费价格将出现更明显的波动，这将要求采取比过去更严格的货币和财政政策。【原文：Economies around world are set for more pronounced swings in consumer prices that will require tighter monetary and fiscal policies than in the past, according to Czech central bank Governor Ales Michl.】

item.title: 特朗普盟友提出对使用中国港口的拉美商品征收 60% 的关税
item.description: 根据上周末提出的一项计划，经由中国港口运往拉美各地的任何地方的商品都将面临当选总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺的对来自亚洲贸易强国的进口商品征收 60% 的关税。【原文：Goods from anywhere shipped through Chinese ports across Latin America would face the same 60% tariffs as those President-elect Donald Trump has promised on imports from the Asian trade powerhouse under a plan proposed over the weekend.】

item.title: 为什么科技界的亿万富翁们喜欢《侏罗纪公园》的作者？
item.description:
以及为什么迈克尔-克莱顿不会回爱他们。【原文：

And why Michael Crichton wouldn’t have loved them back.

】

item.title: Revolut 将利用新许可证启动英国和欧盟股票交易
item.description: 随着服务于英国投资者的零售经纪商之间的竞争加剧，欧洲最有价值的金融科技公司 Revolut Ltd. 将从明年开始提供英国和欧盟上市股票交易服务。【原文：Revolut Ltd., Europe’s most valuable fintech, will offer trading of UK and EU-listed stocks from next year, as competition among retail brokers serving British investors intensifies.】

item.title: 贝恩资本为全球特殊情况融资 57 亿美元
item.description: 贝恩资本为全球特殊情况融资 57 亿美元，将与此前为亚洲和欧洲的基金及附属工具融资的 33 亿美元一起部署。【原文：Bain Capital raised $5.7 billion for global special situations that will be deployed alongside the $3.3 billion it previously raised for funds and affiliated vehicles in Asia and Europe.】

item.title: 奥地利在德国大选阴影下寻求三方联盟
item.description: 奥地利的中间派政党正在就三方政府联盟进行正式谈判，目的是进行广泛的政策变革，而德国的类似安排也以失败告终。【原文：Austria’s centrist parties are entering formal negotiations on a three-way government coalition with the aim of broad-ranging policy change, just as a similar set-up in Germany failed.】

item.title: 花旗预计南非改革将推动股市跑赢大盘
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）预计，南非股市将克服近期的疲软态势，表现将优于新兴市场同行，因为新政府支持改革的议程将缓和与美国大选结果相关的不利因素。【原文：Citigroup Inc. expects South African equities to overcome recent weakness and outperform emerging market peers, as the new government’s pro-reform agenda tempers headwinds linked to the US election outcome.】

item.title: 智利经济恢复增长，政府对前景发出警告
item.description: 智利经济在第三季度恢复了增长，因为需求强劲，这为准备下调今年经济扩张预期的加布里埃尔-博里奇总统的政府提供了有限的宽慰。【原文：Chile’s economy returned to growth in the third quarter as demand firmed, providing limited relief to President Gabriel Boric’s administration as it prepares to cut its forecast for expansion this year.】

item.title: 几乎所有 ETF 在过去一年中都取得了收益
item.description: 在大选后的强劲反弹之后，上周的股票回调不要太沮丧：今年是通过金融市场创造财富的丰收年。【原文：Don't get too disheartened by last week’s stock pullback after the intense post-election rally: It’s been a banner year all round for building wealth from financial markets.】

item.title: 欧洲央行马克洛夫支持审慎、谨慎的降息政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员加布里埃尔-马赫卢夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）表示，不必急于加快降息步伐，他反对更大幅度降息的想法。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf said there’s no rush to lower interest rates at a faster pace, rejecting the idea of bigger cuts.】

item.title: 新加坡结束追捕没收 14 亿美元的洗钱者
item.description: 在嫌疑人同意向当局交出总价值 18.5 亿新元（14 亿美元）的资产后，新加坡警方结束了对该国有史以来最大洗钱丑闻中 15 名涉案人员的追捕。【原文：Singapore police ended their pursuit of 15 people involved in the country’s largest-ever money laundering scandal, after the suspects agreed to surrender a total of S$1.85 billion ($1.4 billion) worth of assets to authorities.】

item.title: 安哥拉交易所首席执行官称，预计到2027年上市量将翻一番
item.description: 安哥拉证券交易所首席执行官说，随着安哥拉一些最大的产油国公司准备在市场上出售股票，预计到2027年，安哥拉证券交易所的上市量将增加一倍以上。【原文：Listings on Angola’s stock exchange are expected to more than double by 2027 as some of the oil producing country’s biggest companies prepare to sell shares on the market, its chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 二十国集团里约热内卢峰会最新消息
item.description:
【原文：

   

】

item.title: 鲍威尔可能要等到 2026 年住房通胀才会降温
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）上周表示，央行行长们正在密切关注 "尚未完全正常化 "的房地产通胀。他们可能需要等待一年多的时间。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said last week central bankers are keeping a close eye on housing inflation, which “has yet to fully normalize.” They could be waiting more than a year.】
